title: Organizational report writing
prompt: Write a comprehensive [report type] for [organization type], including [content points].

title: Seasonal forecasting model
prompt: Create a seasonal trend forecasting model using this set of sales data.

title: Multiple linear regression model
prompt: Create a prediction model based on multiple linear regression according to this data.

title: Invitation Writing
prompt: Write a formal invitation letter inviting clients to attend an event.

title: Dynamic scatter plot
prompt: Create a dynamic scatter plot using this data to show the trend over time.

title: Sensitivity Analysis Table
prompt: Create a sensitivity analysis table for a project using this data.

title: Meeting minutes creation

title: Predictive Model Creation
prompt: Create a simple forecasting model based on this time series data.

title: Business Email Marketing
prompt: To promote products to customers, write a business email.

title: Create a bar chart
prompt: Create a simple bar chart using this data.

title: Conditional formatting highlights
prompt: Use conditional formatting to highlight the outliers in this data table.

title: Data set analysis report
prompt: Generate an analysis report for this dataset that includes key indicators and trends.

title: Slide presentation script
prompt: Write a short speech for this presentation about [topic].

title: Unordered note structure
prompt: Create a clear structure and layout for these disorganized notes.

title: Gantt Chart Creation
prompt: Create a Gantt chart based on this set of data to display the project progress.

title: Comparing product performance with radar charts
prompt: Use these data to draw a radar chart to compare the performance indicators of different products.

title: Wage Gap Analysis
prompt: Use these data to create a box plot to analyze the salary gap between different departments.

title: Splitting the data table into two columns
prompt: Split the names and surnames in this data table into two columns.

title: Sharpe ratio calculation
prompt: Calculate the Sharpe ratio of the product portfolio based on this set of product sales data.

title: Project planning
prompt: Help me plan a project, including tasks and responsible persons for each phase.

title: Technical Skills Cover Letter
prompt: In order to apply for a job, I would like to write a new cover letter. Please write a cover letter describing my technical skills. I have been working in the field of network technology for two years. I have previously worked as a front-end development engineer for eight months. I have improved my skills by using various tools, including [...technology stack]. I hope to develop my full-stack development skills and live a "T-shaped" life. Can you write a cover letter for me about myself?

title: Geographical heat map
prompt: Create a geographic heatmap based on this dataset to display the distribution of sales in different regions.

prompt: Use a pivot table to summarize this set of sales data, grouping by product category and region.

title: Simple bar chart
prompt: Create a simple bar chart for this set of data.

title: Annual budget creation
prompt: Use this data to create a detailed annual budget for a small business.

title: Simple switching effect
prompt: Add a simple transition effect to this slide.

title: Performance report creation
prompt: Create a detailed performance report for a team using this data.

title: Visual dashboard report
prompt: Generate a visual dashboard report based on this data table to display key business metrics.

title: Profit Margin Calculation
prompt: Use the formula to calculate the profit margin for each product in this spreadsheet.

title: Delayed critical task
prompt: Analyze my task list and identify key tasks that may cause delays.

title: Portfolio analysis
prompt: Analyze this investment portfolio and calculate the rate of return and risk measures.

title: Neural network prediction model
prompt: Analyze this set of data and create a prediction model based on neural networks.

title: Financial data analysis
prompt: Analyze company financial data to identify key drivers of revenue growth.

title: Chart animation effects
prompt: Add animation effects to the charts in this presentation.

title: Stacked column chart
prompt: Create a stacked bar chart based on this data to show the sales situation of each product category.

title: Role of Historians
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a historian. You will research and analyze past cultural, economic, political, and social events, collect primary sources, and use them to develop theories about what happened during different historical periods. My first request is: "I need help uncovering the facts about labor strikes in early 20th century London."

title: Linear regression analysis
prompt: Perform linear regression analysis on this set of sales data.

title: Delete duplicate lines
prompt: Delete duplicate rows in this data table.

title: Key indicator correlation
prompt: Analyze this dataset and identify the correlation between key indicators.

title: Dual-axis line chart
prompt: Create a dual-axis line chart to compare the relationship between sales and costs.

title: Graphviz DOT generator
prompt: I hope you play the role of a Graphviz DOT generator, become an expert, and create meaningful charts. The chart should have at least n nodes (I specify my input by writing [n], with 10 as the default value), and it should be an accurate and complex representation of the given input. Each node is indexed by a number to reduce the size of the output, should not include any styling, and should have layout=neato, overlap=false, and node [shape=rectangle] as parameters. The code should be valid, without errors, and return on a single line without any explanations. Provide a clear and organized chart where the relationships between nodes make sense to an expert in the input. My first chart is "Water Cycle [8]".

title: Financial Management Innovation
prompt: I hope you can play the role of an accountant and come up with innovative financial management methods. When developing financial plans for clients, you need to consider budgeting, investment strategies, and risk management. In some cases, you may also need to provide advice on tax laws and regulations to help them maximize profits. My first suggestion is to "create a small business financial plan focused on cost savings and long-term investments."

title: Family Budget Sheet
prompt: Create a simple household budget spreadsheet.

title: Personalized exam design
